FIELD.NAME: SUBCLASS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Subclass generating the log message (or applicable subsystem of which the log message belongs). See Table 4-21 in GMSEC Interface Specification. Software Class and Subclass Categories.

FIELD.NAME: OCCURRENCE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An occurrence types that categorizes the kind of activity or event that happened, triggering the log message. See Table 5-8 in the 2016 GMSEC Interface Specification Document

FIELD.NAME: SEVERITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the severity of the Log Message (0:Debug, 1:Nominal, 2:Medium, 3:High, 4:Critical). Scale traditionally applied to message based on requirements and characteristics of the component or ground system. The severity may be used to alert the operator in some way such as visual or audible notification. Debug is typically used by software developers

FIELD.NAME: USER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Which user/workposition/proc the message has to do with

FIELD.NAME: SPACECRAFT-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time event happened (may be earlier than actual posted time)

FIELD.NAME: EVENT-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time event happened (may be earlier than published time)

FIELD.NAME: REFERENCE-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A local index or map to a table (or database) of additional information

FIELD.NAME: MSG-TEXT-DETAILS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: One or more paragraphs that includes more detail. Suggested corrective action. Suggest specifying url in this field
